product_name: New Balance MT1210 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Inspired by the legendary Leadville 100 race and built for ultra runners, the New Balance MT1210 Trail-Running Shoes use N2 cushioning and rugged Vibram(R) outsoles so you can test your limits. Feature breathable synthetic/mesh uppers and debris-free construction; flexible overlays in optimal areas. Innovative REVlite EVA midsoles provide premium responsiveness and durability at a 30% lighter weight than other foams with comparable performance. Medial posts consist of higher-density compression-molded EVA, located on inside edges of shoes, to help prevent over-pronation. Polyurethane inserts add extra layers of stability and cushioning. New Balance MT1210 Trail-Running Shoes for men have Vibram rubber outsoles that provide good traction on rough trails.
short_description: Inspired by the legendary Leadville 100 race and built for ultra runners, the New Balance MT1210 Trail-Running Shoes use N2 cushioning and rugged Vibram(R) outsoles so you can test your limits.
